item.source: Crystal Bow drawback ID and drawback speed

item.title: Crystal Bow drawback ID and drawback speed
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Ignore the other posts in this thread… Does anyone have the ID for the Cbow drawback? 250 is JUST THE ARROW… And does anyone know how I can change the speed of the drawback? The speed in createprojectile is obviously the speed of the projectile… The drawback is like 3 times the speed it should be(which means the projectiles are flying 3 times faster than the damage).

public void drawback() { if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 882){ gfx100(18); } else if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 884) { gfx100(19); } else if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 886) { gfx100(20); } else if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 888) { gfx100(21); } else if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 890) { gfx100(22); } else if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 892) { gfx100(24); } else if (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == -1) { gfx100(250); } }
That’s all I know haha

Thanks.

Read full topic
